alert.note: Alert for Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 4:25PM MST until September 13 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Navajo County near Clay Springs in north central Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 423 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clay Springs, or 15 miles northwest of Show Low, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clay Springs, Shumway, Linden, Fool Hollow Lake, Taylor Airport, Ned Lake, Pintail Lake, White Mountain Lake Estates, Fool Hollow Lake Campground, and White Mountain Lake. This includes the following highways... State Route 277 between mile markers 325 and 328. State Route 260 near mile marker 330, and between mile markers 333 and 336. State Route 77 between mile markers 346 and 356. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
